1.content:
In the war-torn lands of Erinn, the Fomor are gaining land and strength with every battle as the humans are being pushed back. Being extremely desperate, they call upon anyone that is willing to put their sword up for the cause. Small groups like Crimson Blade come to play as they march against the Fomors. Our story takes place on a few rookies who helped save the Oracle and are now on their way to be heroes. Which hero fits you the best?

Lann, at first glance, he looks to be a common sell-sword. Doing it for the money, contract killer, making blood-gold. In reality, this muscled swordsman is in it for revenge when he watched as his town burn. He is dead set on exterminating all of the Fomors for ruining all that was in his life.

Born from a wealthy family, Evie was taught the best magic that can be bought. This busty sorceress trained in all schools of magic to master combat against the Fomorian armies. When she sparred, she would taunt the rest of the class wearing tight and revealing clothing. That old habit carried on as she joined the Crimson Blades for her first taste of real battle. Even though comrades were getting cut down and slaughtered, she practically reveled in it. She was in the war she always dreamed of.

The thundering giant Karok comes to the town of Colhen in search of answers. Who are the Fomors and can you smash it? Karok's home isn't in immediate threat of the Fomor's but they are smart enough to ready themselves for battle. This 300 pound moving muscle seeks to find the biggest Fomor and crack it's head open with the biggest rock.

As the rest came with stories, titles, and legends. Fiona comes with just her name and her shield. She offers no background and no reason of fighting. This stalwart defender is built strong yet is still attractive. Most men fear her because of her mysteriousness. She likes being noticed but not being touched. She keeps everyone at arms length.
1.title: Character Selection

12.content:
The dark-haired witch storms into the Mercenary outpost after slaying the white spider. Evie's breasts bounce with every step and her butt sways with her movements. She is wearing a brown robe given by her graduating class where she made some 'modifications' to it making it as tight as possible.

"I want more" Evie demands

Marrec almost didn't hear her with Gywnn yelling at him about the strategies hes giving her. "I'm sorry?"

"Give me more to fight, I did not sit through hours of lectures to fight fodder. I want to fight ogres, lizardmen, kobolds, bears, or hell, throw in a dragon if you want."

"As much as I'd want to give you a mission, our men aren't ready to go out yet. Now sit down and relax, we have a couple days until our next move."

"You saw me single-handedly save the oracle and fight of hordes of Fomor. You know I can go do more fighting."

"Those Fomor were deep in our territory, outnumbered and cornered. Even if you fell, our reserves could have easily handled it."

"I don't need your men, I need a place and I will conquer it. I need a monster and I will slay it. I need a war and I will win it."

"Are you really that eager to get yourself killed? Fine then, go take a boat to one of the listed locations. I will tell your family you didn't die by boredom."

"Thank you, about time."

Evie struts out the door ready for battle. She gets to the docks and preps for sail. Where shall she go?
12.title: Evie the witch

121.content:
One of the first forts of the humans, the Fomors devastated the area in recent attacks and gained full control. Marrec, after being pestered to his last nerve, sent Evie to regain some land and establish a foothold. Evie comes in wearing the Broken Ash armor that she bought from another adventurer. With her tits perked up, and her skirt conformed to her ass. She sets off to fight what monsters that lay ahead. Quickly dispatching the small group of gnolls guarding the dock entrance, she sets deeper into the ruins. Evie notices a large spiderweb.

"One would say this place has a spider infestation." She giggled to herself, not even considering that she might be in imminent danger. Just as she turns around she notices a shadow creep out of sight.

"Come out and fight like a man"

She notices a shadow slip away again from the corner of her eye. She is ready to just burn half the place down when the monster grabs her from behind...
121.title: Perious Ruins

1211.content:
A lone spider, just the size of Evie's torso, latches onto her back and starts spraying its web. Evie panics and starts flailing about, making it spread all over her arms and getting herself locked in. She drops her staff and collapses as the spider begins to spray over her breasts. As the one spider is working on he chest, she notices a swarm of spiders come out of the ruins engulfing her head to toe in a cocoon of web. She is completely immobilized but can still see through some of the webbing. The spiders drag her into a hole where she can see thousands of the tiny spiders all underneath with other cocoons nestled in webs. Evie is taken past the others and brought to a large chamber where it is almost big enough to fit half of Colhen in. The spiders leave her in a nest to wait for her impending doom.

Fading in and out of sleep Evie finds out that she has a small opening near her hand enough to wiggle her fingers. She is trying to attempt a small flare spell without attracting the attention of the spider horde. As she is getting ready, she hears the spiders in the room scatter out, and she feels a small quake. Evie fears what is coming out of the large tunnel and starts casting the spell.
1211.title: A spider

info.brief_description: Fan Story of the Korean Game Vindictus made by devCat and published by Nexon
info.description:
This is an interactive that will play out in the world of Vindictus. Readers should be aware that is this all fan-made and can be skewed off the actual storyline. Readers should also be aware that this story will have Vore (eaten alive) aspects that may include death. If you have a problem with that, please do not go ahead.

At the start, you will pick one of the current four characters: Lann, Evie, Fiona, or Karok
You will be given a description of the said character. Contributers may add Fan-made characters if they wish.

Each character will have a personal storyline which will branch off in certain zones and then the characters will encounter monsters that they will be either kill or get eaten by.

Anyone that wishes to contribute must follow a few rules:
#1 If there is a death/digestion section, it must be tagged.
#2 Spellcheck must be used.
#3 No Gore

My writing will be focused on primarily on Evie and Fiona (I can only write well if I am interested)
For the males, majority must be contributed by other writers.

Enjoy
